name: GGD1 - Star Tracer
description:
SUMMARY:

This is my entitled "Star Tracer" 2D Shooter project in response to the challenge presented by the specialization course "Game Design and Development" that can be found on the Coursera portal, presented and instructed by Brian Winn :)

I added the following elements to it:

  1. Added 3 complete NEW levels for you to entertain yourself with for many many HOURS I believe!
  2. Afraid you might die at any moment? Fear not, health bar is here to help you manage until the END!
  3. Lost on your objective? Added new ENEMY counter! Kill them all and finish every level! :)

CREDITS: 

Created with <3 by Andre Proenca!
